title: Toyota 2,900 Lb Electric Forklift With Power Factor Charger
item_description:
Toyota 2,900 Lb Electric Forklift With Power Factor Charger

Note: Forklift has been reserved by Auctioneer and will be available for pickup by appointment only on the last day of removal from 3:00 pm - 3:30 pm. This unit will be used during the removal period, therefore the hours below are an approximate guideline.
  • Manufacturer: Toyota
  • Model: 7FBCU18
  • Load Capacity: 2900lbs
  • Fuel Type: Electric
  • Mast Type: Three Stage
  • Hour Meter Reads: 7,135
  • Serial Number: 68355
  • Overall Width: 37”
  • Overall Length: 118”
  • Overall Height: 86”
  • Truck Weight: 7,500lbs
  • Tread Width: 5”
  • Tire Type: Solid Rubber
  • Number of Front Tires: 2
  • Front Tire Size: 457/152-308
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2
  • Rear Tire Size: 356/114-203.2
  • Maximum Lift Height: 198”
  • Fork Length: 40”
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes
  • Features: Side Shift Tilt
  • Note: Buyer is responsible for disconnection of battery charger
